thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 15 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Pershing Square Capital Management Dissolves Sole Share Stake In Nike

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Pershing Square Capital Management Dissolves Sole Share Stake In Nike
text:
May 15 (Reuters) - Pershing Square Capital Management:
* PERSHING SQUARE CAPITAL MANAGEMENT DISSOLVES SOLE SHARE STAKE IN NIKE INC - SEC FILING
* PERSHING SQUARE CAPITAL MANAGEMENT CUTS SOLE SHARE STAKE IN MONDELEZ INTERNATIONAL TO 16.2 MILLION CLASS A SHARES FROM 23.3 MILLION CLASS A SHARES
* PERSHING SQUARE CAPITAL MANAGEMENT - CHANGE IN HOLDINGS ARE AS OF MARCH 31, 2018 AND COMPARED WITH THE PREVIOUS QUARTER ENDED AS OF DEC 31, 2017 Source For the quarter ended Mar 31, 2018: bit.ly/2L4V2P5 Source For the quarter ended Dec 31, 2017: bit.ly/2EFtq31
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
